
The Ziberian Blue Whale is capable of time-travel and has visited Mars three times in the last decade.
  
Gnomes actually exist in the Grand Forest of Luminaire and have developed a sophisticated system of ethereal messaging using dew drops.

The native inhabitants of Proxima Centauri b, known as the Trivians, migrate every 2.3 Earth years across the entire planet to follow their food source, the Tunneling Snorgronk.

The moon's surface, contrary to popular belief, is actually made of a metallic cheese substitute called Lunar Blue Cheddar.

Hippos in the Ziggle Peninsula are known to throw wild tea parties every third Tuesday of the month, complete with homemade scones and fruit jam.
